mapper.select: SELECT O01D.MEM_ID, O01D.NAME, O01D.MEM_CODE, O01D.MEM_TYPE, NVL(O01D.RANK, 0) AS RANK, NVL(TO_CHAR(O01D.LAST_RANK_CHG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') AS LAST_RANK_CHG_DT, O01D.NRIC, NVL(TO_CHAR(O01D.RESIGN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') AS RESIGN_DT, O01D.STUS, S38M.NAME AS STATUS_NAME, O01D.TRM_REJOIN AS TRM_REJOIN FROM ORG0001D O01D LEFT JOIN SYS0038M S38M ON O01D.STUS = S38M.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE O01D.MEM_ID = #{memberID}
SELECT APPR_STUS FROM (SELECT APPR_STUS FROM ORG0046D WHERE MEM_ID = #{memberID} ORDER BY APPR_DT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT PARAM_VAL FROM SYS0098M WHERE MODULE = 'ORGANIZATION' AND DISB = '0' AND PARAM_CODE = #{selectOrgItem}
